scripts.templateService-test: newman run tests/TemplateService-Automate.postman_collection.json -d data/data-templateService.csv -e environment/dev-91.json --reporters cli,junit,html --reporter-junit-export newman/templateServicexml.xml --reporter-html-export newman/templateServicehtml.html
scripts.communicationService-test: newman run tests/CommunicationService-Automate.postman_collection.json -d data/data-communicationService.csv -e environment/dev-91.json --reporters cli,junit,html --reporter-junit-export newman/communicationServicexml.xml --reporter-html-export newman/communicationServicehtml.html
